name: Resurrected
description:
A magical girl has revived Fallen Shadow, but she needs to claw her way to the surface after waking up. A short puzzle game based on Shadows Halloween mode.

Default controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys - Movement
  • R - Restart
  • Esc - Level select / Options menu
  • Enter/Space - Select
  • [Touch screen controls can be enabled/disabled in options]
